Reference

BANKSY functions

ComputeBanksy()

Compute Banksy Matrices

getBanksyMatrix()

Returns the Banksy matrix (own + nbr)

Processing

NormalizeBanksy()

Normalize columns to a normFactor

ScaleBanksy()

Scale rows

SubsetBanksy()

Subset a BanksyObject

SplitBanksy()

Split a BanksyObject by metadata column

Dimensionality reduction

RunPCA()

Run PCA

RunUMAP()

Run UMAP

Clustering

ClusterBanksy()

Cluster based on joint expression matrix

ConnectClusters()

Harmonize cluster labels among parameter runs

getARI()

Calculate adjusted rand index for harmonized clusters

Visualisation

plotReduction()

Plot dimensionality reduction assays

plotSpatial()

Plot Spatial dims

plotSpatialFeatures()

Wrapper for plotSpatial

plotHeatmap()

Plot Heatmap (wrapper for ComplexHeatmap)

plotARI()

Plot ARI matrix

plotAlluvia()

Plot Alluvial plot for different cluster assignments

plotScree()

Plots scree plot for PCA

Construction

BanksyObject() own.expr() nbr.expr() custom.expr() cell.locs() meta.data() reduction() clust.names() `own.expr<-`() `nbr.expr<-`() `custom.expr<-`() `cell.locs<-`() `meta.data<-`() `reduction<-`() show(<BanksyObject>) head(<BanksyObject>)

S4 class BanksyObject

asBanksyObject()

Convert a SingleCellExperiment to BanksyObject

Datasets

cerebellum

Mouse cerebellum Slide-seq V2 data

dlpfc151673

Human dorsolateral prefrontal cortex 10x Visium data (sample 151673)

dlpfc151674

Human dorsolateral prefrontal cortex 10x Visium data (sample 151674)

dlpfc151675

Human dorsolateral prefrontal cortex 10x Visium data (sample 151675)

dlpfc151676

Human dorsolateral prefrontal cortex 10x Visium data (sample 151676)

hippocampus

Mouse Hippocampus VeraFISH data

hypothalamus

Mouse Hypothalamus MERFISH data

visualcortex

Mouse visual cortex SeqFISH data

Misc.

simulateDataset()

Simulate a dataset consisting of expression and location information with concentric circular structure
